actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve family child care by prescribing the formula for allocating indirect expenses to a child care service business conducted in the taxpayer's residence.
short_title: Family Child Care Improvement Act of 1991

summary.text: Family Child Care Improvement Act of 1991 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the formula for allocating expense deductions to a day care service business in a taxpayer's home.

titles.title: Family Child Care Improvement Act of 1991

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to improve family child care by prescribing the formula for allocating indirect expenses to a child care service business conducted in the taxpayer's residence.
